text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I was coming and going due to the races, 
but… I was able to finish the summer 
training camp without incident!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I have realized something, just now…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
In terms of distance traveled, surely
I must have passed the 3600 meter mark
by now!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps I've already covered about 
100 million meters…!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I, I… 
I'm just way too brilliant――!?
choice_data_list: ……Unchartered territory for an Uma Musume, huh!
……Unchartered territory for an Uma Musume, huh!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hawawawawaa, my excellence is 
just terrifying…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But I cannot settle for just this!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to go run on the beach 
and extend the distance even more!!
I rushed after Sakura Bakushin O!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
choice_data_list: Wait, the bus is already here!
Wait, the bus is already here!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Eh!? Then, I cannot proceed! 
Tardiness is a class president no-go!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm turning back right awa―― 
Aaaaahhhh――?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Aaah, my speed has turned against me…! 
Trainer, you're soaking weeet―!!

…This is how the, hot? summer camp with 
Sakura Bakushin O came to an end.
